thread.title: Coldplay Reportedly Plan “Peace Concerts” For Israelis And Palestinians
thread.title_full: Coldplay Reportedly Plan “Peace Concerts” For Israelis And Palestinians

author: Stereogum
title: Coldplay Reportedly Plan “Peace Concerts” For Israelis And Palestinians
text: Coldplay are planning two "peace concerts" for Israelis and Palestinians, The Times Of Israel reports. The concerts are scheduled for 11/3 and 11/4 and will be held at an outdoor location north of the Dead Sea. Fifty-thousand tickets will go on sale for each show as soon as security and all the logistics are … More »
